name: Erynar
description:
Welcome to Erynar

It was once an enchanted forest, far away from our world.
In the forest lived three spirits who guarded the forest.

There was also a human forest guardian who made sure that the forest spirits did their work properly.

One day, the forest guard was too old, so his granddaughter had to take over his duties.
But it is not so easy to look after three forest spirits from one day to the next...

Come  to Erynar and get to know the forest and its inhabitants.
Can you win their trust?
